page.title: 05St. Laurence Church
page.content: Many families have close connections with the local church. The{Prince}family is one of them:Mr. George Prince (Sarah's Grandpa) has been a church warden for 30 years and a bell ringer for 51 years. He also works very hard in the church and in the church yard. Mrs.Prince(Sarahs Nanna) is the verger and a sides man. Sarah Watson(granddaughter)is in the choir. The{Strickland-Constables }have made a substantial contribution to the life of the church over the years. Using the church's extensive records,{Mr.N. Wright,}a former headteacher at this school, has written many historical pamphlets to trace the development of religion, family life, and education in the area.
